title: What Comes After a Storm? From Twyla Tharp, a Softer World
description: The prolific choreographer tells a new story with two classic works at New York City Center: “In the Upper Room” and “Nine Sinatra Songs.” In that order.
dc:creator: Gia Kourlas
media:credit: Julieta Cervantes for The New York Times
media:description: Twyla Tharp giving notes to dancers at a recent rehearsal of the “In the Upper Room” and “Nine Sinatra Songs.” From left, Richard Villaverde, Marzia Memoli, Jada German and Jeanette Delgado.
